items.title: Man who burned Quran 'shot dead in Sweden'
items.description: Salwan Momika, 38, is reported to have been killed in an apartment in Södertälje, Stockholm.

items.title: Zuma's daughter arrested over South Africa riots
items.description: Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla is accused of inciting violence in 2021 following the jailing of her father.

items.title: Five skiers killed in French Alps avalanches
items.description: Two separate avalanches killed four Norwegians and one Swiss skier.

items.title: DR Congo president vows 'vigorous' fight to halt M23 rebel advance
items.description: DR Congo's leader says the country "will not let itself be humiliated" after rebels seized the city of Goma.

items.title: What we know so far about Washington DC plane crash
items.description: The aircraft collided with a military helicopter that was on a training flight as it approached the runway.
